business.headline: How this scheme can help you save Rs 20 lakh in 15 years for daughterIf you are planning for your daughter's higher education expenses, the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) can be a great savings option.

Razorpay's Shashank Kumar, Harshil Mathur become India's youngest billionairesHarshil Mathur and Shashank Kumar met at IIT Roorkee, where they shared an interest in technology and problem-solving. Their journey into fintech began in 2014 when they launched Razorpay to simplify digital payments in India.
Sensex, Nifty fall in early trade over Trump tariff threats; Infosys down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 282.59 points to 77,323.84, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 84.70 points to 23,507.25 as of 9:42 am.
Planning a bank transfer on March 31? Here's why it may not workWhile banks will remain open, transactions like fund transfers, cash deposits, and withdrawals may not go through.

Stocks to watch today: Infosys, Tata Motors, BEL, Adani Power, HCLTech and moreMarkets are set for a strong start on March 6 as key stocks like Infosys, Tata Motors, and Adani Power grab attention. Trade talks, global deals, and company moves could shape today's trading session. Here's what investors need to know.

Sensex, Nifty today: Will positive run continue on stock market?Stock market opening today: The Sensex and Nifty gained in the previous session amid reports of positive talks between Indian and US officials about a trade deal. Analysts have noted that the focus during today's trading session will be on upcoming tariff developments and the India-US trade deal outcome.
US suspends WTO financial contributions: ReportThe Trump administration has reportedly suspended financial contributions to The World Trade Organisation amid efforts to cut back government spending.
Wall Street drifts as auto tariffs hurt GM, help Tesla and othersDonald Trump's auto tariffs impacted Wall Street on Thursday morning, with autogiant General Motors falling by 6.8%.

Trump's 25% auto tariff: Which Indian companies will pay the priceUS President Donald Trump's 25% tariff on car imports will affect a few Indian companies, including Tata Motors, Eicher Motors, and Samvardhana Motherson. These firms ship components to the US and Europe's markets.

Sensex, Nifty close higher: Top gainers and losers, tariff impact and key driversStock market today: Some of the top gainers during today's session were Bajaj Finserv, IndusInd Bank, NTPC, L&T, Ultratech Cement, Hero MotoCorp, Adani Enterprises and BPCL. On the other hand, some of the top losers were Tata Motors, Sun Pharma, Eicher Motors, Apollo Hospitals, Bharti Airtel, Kotak Mahindra Bank and HCLTech.

Sensex ends 318 points higher, Nifty just below 23,600; Tata Motors down 5%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 317.93 points higher at 77,606.43, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 105.10 points to settle at 23,591.95.

Noida, Greater Noida flat registration fees may rise 20-30%According to a draft notification, circle rates in Noida could see a 20% hike, while in Greater Noida, the increase may go up to 30%. The move is expected to make property transactions more expensive in the region.

India may receive reprieve from proposed US tariffs: SourcesIndia may escape the proposed US tariffs and avoid being grouped with nations like China, Mexico, and Canada, according to government sources. Trade talks between the two countries are progressing smoothly, with no signs of a deadlock as the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs approaches.

RBI may double foreign individual investor limit to 10% in listed firms: ReportForeign portfolio investors (FPIs), pressured by poor earnings, high valuations and prospects of U.S. tariffs, have pulled more than $28 billion out of Indian stocks since September's record high in the benchmark NSE Nifty 50.

Elon Musk leads Hurun Global Rich List despite $100 billion drop in net worthElon Musk has reretained his position as the wealthiest person in the world for the fourth time in five years, becoming the first individual to surpass the $400 billion threshold, noted the Hurun Research report.

US tariff reprieve for India, may not be treated like China, Canada, Mexico: SourcesTrade talks between the two nations are progressing smoothly, with no deadlock expected before the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs.

Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Sensex, Nifty gain after opening lower in volatile trade; Wipro rises nearly 2%Stock market opening: While the Sensex opened 100 points lower, it was trading 64.27 points higher at 77,552.77 at around 9.26 am. The Nifty50 was trading 16.75 points higher at 23,503.60.

Top stocks to watch today: Tata Motors, Wipro, JB Chemicals, Infosys, Vedanta, UPLWhile positive cues are likely to support the two leading indices on Dalal Street, US tariff uncertainty looms large. Here are some of the key stocks that will be in focus today.

Stock market on March 27: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty today?Stock market prediction: Nifty and Sensex have gained nearly 2% in the past five sessions, but investors will now be watching to see if the market can recover from Wednesday's drop.

How can India cement its position in the global value chain?With global value chains (GVCs) driving over 70% of international trade, India's growth story hinges on its ability to integrate into and scale within these networks.

Tesla to enter Saudi Arabia as Elon Musk mends rift with kingdomAmerican EV giant Tesla announced its entry into the Saudi Arabian market after company CEO Elon Musk's relations with the Kingdom improved in recent months.

UPI outage hits several users across India, NPCI says issue resolvedThe National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) acknowledged the issue, stating that it was caused by intermittent technical difficulties, resulting in partial transaction failures.
Wall Street is drifting again after getting whipsawed for weeksThe New York Stock Exchange saw a steady opening on Wednesday with marginal drops for S&P 500 and the Nasdaq composite.

Cancer, diabetes drugs under government price control to get costlier: SourcesGovernment-controlled medicines, including that of cancer, diabetes, heart-related concerns and other antibiotics, are set to become more expensive by 1.7 per cent, government sources told India Today TV's sister publication, Business Today.

Stock market closing: Top gainers and losers on Sensex, NiftyBenchmark indices snapped their seven-day winning streak, as investors turned cautious ahead of the monthly expiry. The S&P BSE Sensex dropped 728.69 points to close at 77,288.50, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 181.80 points, ending the session at 23,486.85.

India may lower duties on Harley-Davidson bikes, bourbon whiskey: SourcesIndia may further reduce import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles, US wines, and bourbon whiskey as part of ongoing India-US trade talks, according to sources.

Sensex tumbles over 700 points, Nifty settles below 23,500; IndusInd Bank up 3%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 728.69 points lower to 77,288.50,  while the NSE Nifty50 declined 181.80 points to settle at 23,486.85.

India may cut duties on Harley bikes, bourbon whiskey amid US talks: SourcesThe government had earlier reduced import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles from 50% to 40%. Similarly, import duty on Bourbon whisky was reduced from 150% to 100% in the past.

Insurance regulator flags concerns over Star Health's claim settlements: ReportAccording to IRDAI's handbook of insurance statistics, Star Health's incurred claim ratio stood at 66.47% for the financial year 2023-24. This ratio indicates the percentage of premium income that an insurance company pays out in claims.

IndusInd Bank raised $2 billion via market deposits in March: ReportThe country's fifth-largest private sector bank flagged earlier in the month a $175 million hole in its balance sheet, citing accounting discrepancies in its derivatives portfolio.

Sensex down 700 points: Why is stock market down despite FII buying, GDP growth?Stock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 755.50 points to 77,261.69, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 178.80 points to 23,489.85 as of 2:56 pm.

Why are Zomato, Swiggy shares falling today? Check key reasons, price targetsZomato, Swiggy stock price: Today's drop in Zomato and Swiggy's share price comes after a media report suggested that brokerage firm BofA Securities downgraded them.

India's GDP grows 105% in 10 years, now at $4.3 trillion: IMFIndia's economic growth in the past decade has outpaced several major global economies. While India's GDP increased by 105%, the US and China saw growth of 66% and 44%, respectively.

IndusInd Bank shares rise as lender seeks recruiters to hire top executivesIndusInd Bank stock price: The formal search process to fill the top managerial positions at IndusInd Bank is set to begin in April. Reacting to the report, shares of IndusInd Bank rose as much as 3% in early trade.

India on track to surpass Japan's GDP, could overtake Germany by 2027: IMFIndia's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) has more than doubled in the past decade, rising from $2.1 trillion in 2015 to an estimated $4.3 trillion in 2025.
Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%

Key stocks in focus include ONGC, Maruti, HCLTech, and NCC amid corporate developments and investment moves shaping today's session.

Sensex, Nifty opening predictions on March 26: What to expect today?Over the last seven sessions, the Nifty and Sensex have risen 5.7%, turning positive for the year so far. This rally has been supported by foreign capital inflows and expectations of stronger domestic economic growth.

entertainment.headline: Kartik Aaryan's Tu Meri Main Tera, Main Tera Tu Meri eyes Valentine's Day 2026Kartik Aaryan's upcoming film Tu Meri Main Tera, Main Tera Tu Meri is scheduled to hit theatres on Valentine's Day 2026. As per reports, Ananya Panday is set to star alongside Aaryan.

Pics: Inside Ram Charan's 40th birthday bash hosted by wife Upasana KamineniRam Charan turned 40 years old on March 27. His wife, Upasana Kamineni, hosted a grand birthday bash for him, which was attended by actor Lakshmi Manchu, Mahesh Babu's wife, Namrata Shirodkar, and others.

Raid 2 teaser: It is Ajay Devgn vs Riteish Deshmukh in this gripping dramaAjay Devgn returns as IRS officer Amay Patnaik in Raid 2. The teaser hints at a high-stakes showdown with Riteish Deshmukh's character. Directed by Raj Kumar Gupta, the film releases on May 1.

Rakesh Roshan confirms Hrithik Roshan to direct Krrish 4, YRF to produce'Krrish 4', which is India's biggest superhero franchise, is now being directed by the 'superhero' himself, Hrithik Roshan. The film will be produced by YRF.

Ground Zero teaser: Emraan Hashmi leads a daring mission in intense war dramaEmraan Hashmi stars as BSF officer Narendra Nath Dubey in Ground Zero, inspired by real events. The teaser promises an intense war thriller, backed by Excel Entertainment, and also stars Sai Tamhankar.

Kartik Aaryan, Sreeleela's viral pics, videos from Anurag Basu's film set in SiliguriKartik Aaryan and Sreeleela are currently shooting in Siiguri, West Bengal, for their upcoming untitled film by Anurag Basu. Several pictures of the two from the sets have emerged online.

Mohanlal's Empuraan leaked online hours after release, police to take actionMohanlal and Prithviraj Sukumaran's L2: Empuraan was leaked online hours after its grand release. According to reports, the Kerala police launched a probe to look into the source of the leak.

Jackson Wang turns 31: Celebrating music, boundaries, and self-love with GBADJackson Wang drops his second song from Magic Man 2 titled GBAD. The K-pop star explores the theme of setting boundaries in this song. He also turns 31.

Romit Raaj confirms exit from Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata HaiActor Romit Raaj has exited Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, with his character Rohit set to die in an accident. The actor thanked fans and Rajan Shahi for the opportunity, calling the journey 'closest to his heart'.

Govinda's wife Sunita reacts after paps bombard her with questions about actorGovinda's wife, Sunita Ahuja, attended an award show in Mumbai with son Yashvardhan. However, her reaction to the photographers enquiring about the veteran actor caught the attention of all.

How Salman Khan aced a dance move with broken ribs for AR Murugadoss's SikandarSalman Khan revealed he shot a Sikandar song a day after fracturing his ribs, even incorporating the pain into a dance move. Director AR Murugadoss praised his dedication and emotional depth.

Actor Varalaxmi breaks silence on childhood sexual assault: 5-6 people abused meActor Varalaxmi Sarathkumar recently shared the story of her being sexually abused as a child. She requested parents to teach their children about 'good touch' and 'bad touch'.

Sikandar ticket prices soar to Rs 2,200 in multiplexes, Rs 700 in single screensThe advance bookings for Salman Khan's Sikandar have opened. The price surge in tickets indicates the amount of buzz the film has created among the fans.

Empuraan box office Day 1: Mohanlal's film becomes biggest opener in MalayalamMohanlal and Prithviraj Sukumaran's L2: Empuraan opened strong at the box office. The initial trade reports suggest that the film earned Rs 22 crore nett at the domestic box office in all languages.

Veera Dheera Sooran Part 2 review: Vikram shines in a gritty slow-burn action thrillerReleased-Thu Mar 27, 2025Veera Dheera Sooran Part 2 movie review: Vikram returns with a gripping performance in a tense and slow-burning action thriller that keeps the stakes high. Directed by SU Arun Kumar, the film blends raw intensity with a grounded narrative, making for an engaging watch.

Adolescence creator Stephen Graham teases fans about Season 2Netflix's latest series Adolescence has taken the world by storm, topping charts in 80 countries. Creator Stephen Graham recently said how surprised he is by its global impact and also discussed its potential for a sequel.

With consistency, she transformed her body, proving that dedication, varied workouts, and discipline are key to long-term fitness.

general news.headline: Supreme Court's big remark on freedom of speech: Integral part of societyThe Supreme Court's remarks came as it quashed an FIR filed against Congress MP Imran Pratapgarhi over a poem uploaded by him on social media. It holds importance in the backdrop of the Kunal Kamra row.

Kunal Kamra files pre-arrest bail plea amid row over Eknath Shinde 'traitor' jokeStand-up comedian, Kunal Kamra, a resident of Tamil Nadu's Villupuram, applied for transit anticipatory bail, which allows an accused to seek pre-arrest bail in their home state even if the FIR is lodged elsewhere.

Amid AI job threats, Bill Gates lists 3 professions that are safeMicrosoft founder Bill Gates has recently stated that while the AI job threat is real, there are a few careers that will not be affected. In an interview, he highlighted that energy professionals, biologists, and coders will be irreplaceable.

Rhea Chakraborty deserves an apologyRhea Chakraborty found herself in the midst of a raging controversy when Sushant Singh Rajput, a talented Hindi film star, was found dead in his Mumbai home in June 2020.

Old ties with US over, says Canada's new PM amid Trump's tariff threatsCanadian Prime Minister Mark Carney on Thursday declared that the old economic and defence ties with the US were over after his US counterpart, Donald Trump, imposed a 25 per cent tariff on automobile imports.

Passport, driving licence to be cancelled if namaz offered on roads: Meerut copsLast year, similar violations led to cases being filed against 200 people, with over 80 individuals being identified. This year, police are maintaining close surveillance on potential offenders.

Pole dancing as fitness? Why more Indians are giving it a goLike a full-body workout, pole dancing offers numerous health benefits. What sets it apart is its engaging nature and its ability to help individuals combat body dysmorphia, ultimately boosting their confidence.

India to build South Asia's first international theme park. Cruise routes plannedIndia gears up for a world-class entertainment hub with South Asia's first theme park. New cruise routes from Surat to Goa and Dwarka Mandir are set to boost tourism.

Pikachu joins anti-Erdogan stir in Turkey, runs from police in viral videoAs the police attempted to disperse the angry protesters using water cannons, the activist was seen running in his Pokémon-themed costume to evade arrest in the early hours of March 27.

PM Modi to visit Thailand, Sri Lanka from April 3 to 6Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to visit Thailand and Sri Lanka from April 3 to 6. During his visit, he will participate in the 6th BIMSTEC Summit in Bangkok on April 4.

sports.headline: Novak Djokovic sets all-time record, Eala's dream run ends in heartbreakMiami Open 2025: Novak Djokovic became the oldest to reach the semi-finals of an ATP Masters 1000 event after beating Sebastian Korda in straight sets. 19-year-old Alexandra Eala lost to Jessica Pegula in a three-set thriller.

Chennai's MS Dhoni fixation doesn't serve game well: Ambati Rayudu before CSK vs RCBAmbati Rayudu feels that the fixation the Chennai crowd have towards MS Dhoni isn't serving the game and the other CSK players well. Fans have been often chanting for Dhoni and hoping that a wicket falls so that the CSK star comes out to bat.

CSK coach Stephen Fleming reactsChennai Super Kings coach Stephen Fleming has responded to the query about whether Royal Challengers Bengaluru are over-reliant on Virat Kohli ahead of the South Indian derby on Friday, March 28. Kohli has got a good record playing against CSK in the IPL.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
